Views¶

tickets.views.index(request)[source]¶

Provide a list view for tickets.

This view allows the user to sort Ticket objects and manipulate their status and priority. It also provides a link for each tickets detail view.

GET:

This method accepts two different GET parameters show_completed and order_by

show_completed:

@:type boolean

Sets whether to include completed tickets or not.

order_by:

@:type string

Used when querying the database. Can be the name of
any Ticket field. A ‘-‘ character

at the beginning denotes reverse order.

POST:
This method does not process any POST requests.
